description: VidPon® is both a free Digital Coupon Book and Video Daily Deals™ where consumers save 50%-90% on fun events after watching entertaining videos. VidPon® is 100% Paperless. No printing allowed. Consumers can review Digital Coupons or purchase Video Daily Deal™ Tickets on any computer but can only redeemed them with a Smartphone or mobile Internet device. No more lost, forgotten or expired coupons.  Show, Pay, and be on your way.  With VidPon® mobile coupons consumers save on shopping, dining, relaxing and much more.  VidPon® Video Daily Deals™ are the next generation of daily deals. Videos are filmed on location with entertaining actors. VidPon® Video Daily Deals™ make daily deals fun once again!
